iteration.reference: Enter the loop only after start.xml establishes the baseline.

xml-engineering.guideline: Carry forward the schema contract emitted from start.xml so downstream nodes remain stable.
Annotate each iteration with a stage attribute to enable deterministic diffing.
Persist iteration outputs atomically to keep incremental parsers consistent.

steps.step: Load the context emitted by start.xml.
Apply the transformation defined for this iteration.
Emit the iteration snapshot for the next XML stage.
